article-left-comment: 💬 **{{ user }}** left [a comment]({{ replyUrl }}) in {{ article }}.
article-left-reply: 💬 **{{ user }}** left [a reply]({{ replyUrl }}) to a comment in {{ article }}.
log-block-reblocked: 🚫 **{{ author }}** changed the block details for {{ target }}.
log-move-no-redirect: 📦 **{{ author }}** moved {{ from }} to {{ to }} without leaving a redirect.
log-protect-reprotected: 🛡️ **{{ author }}** changed the protect details for {{ target }}.
log-rights: 🏅 **{{ author }}** modified the user groups for **{{ target }}**.
log-upload-reuploaded: 📷 **{{ author }}** uploaded a new version of {{ target }}.
log-upload-reverted: 📷 **{{ author }}** reverted a version of {{ target }}.
post-left-reply: 💭 **{{ user }}** left [a reply]({{ replyUrl }}) to a post.
post-created: 💭 **{{ user }}** created a new post in {{ category }}: [{{ title }}]({{ replyUrl }}).
wall-left-reply: ✉️ **{{ user }}** left [a reply]({{ replyUrl }}) to a message in [{{ wallOwner }}'s message wall]({{ wallUrl }}).
wall-left-message: ✉️ **{{ user }}** left [a new message]({{ replyUrl }}) in [{{ wallOwner }}'s message wall]({{ wallUrl }}).
